scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r ./frontend/client/build/* ./backend/public/
scripts.dev: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Job { cd backend; npm run dev }; Start-Job { cd frontend/client; npm start }; Receive-Job -Wait *"
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/client && npm install
